text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump Yes and the cure is out there due to the brilliance of your father. Just inject yourself with detergent if you have the virus.
Hell, let’s make eating tide pods a thing again.That sounds like a potential cure as well. https://t.co/XZVYTMh0H1
